revised_title: Description of a New Fossil Cone Species: Cheirostrobus from the Calciferous Sandstone
tldr: The author discovers a new type of fossil cone, Cheirostrobus, from the Calciferous Sandstone Series. The cone has a unique structure with compound branched sporophylls, each bearing a number of sporangia. The study of this new cone provides insights into the evolution and classification of ancient plants.
